Updates an existing task.

Removes a user from a task.
Redirect to Google OAuth for calendar authorization
Handle Google OAuth callback
Sync Jamboard events to Google Calendar
Get user's calendar events from Google Calendar

Create a new booking

item.name: Conversations

query.description: Filter by type: 'personal' or 'jam' (leave empty for all)

request.description: Get all conversations for the authenticated user. Can filter by type (personal/jam).
Get only personal (1-on-1) conversations with friends.
Get only Jam group conversations.
Get details of a specific conversation including participants.

variable.description: Friend's user ID to start chat with

request.description: Start or get existing personal conversation with a friend.

variable.description: Jam ID to start/join group chat

request.description: Start or join a Jam group conversation. All Jam members are automatically added as participants.
Toggle mute status for a conversation. Muted conversations won't send push notifications.
Toggle pin status for a conversation. Pinned conversations appear at the top.
Leave a group conversation. Only applicable for Jam group chats.
Add a new participant to a group conversation.

item.description: Endpoints for managing conversations (personal and Jam group chats)

item.name: Messages

query.description: Load messages before this message ID (for pagination)

request.description: Get messages in a conversation. Use before_id for infinite scroll pagination.
Send a text message to a conversation.
Send an image message. First upload the image using /chat/upload endpoint, then send the metadata.
Send a video message with duration and optional thumbnail.
Send an audio or voice note message.
Send a file attachment (PDF, DOC, XLS, etc.).
Send a location message with coordinates and optional address.
Reply to a specific message using reply_to_id.
Edit a message you sent. Only the sender can edit their own messages.
Delete a message you sent. Only the sender can delete their own messages.
Search messages within a conversation.

item.description: Endpoints for sending and managing messages

item.name: Real-time Actions

request.description: Mark specific messages as read. If message_ids is empty/null, marks all unread messages as read.
Send typing indicator to other participants. Set is_typing to false when user stops typing.

item.description: Endpoints for real-time features like typing indicators and read receipts

item.name: Media Upload

formdata.description: Type: image, video, audio, or file

request.description:
Upload a media file for chat messages.

Supported types:
- image: jpeg, png, gif, webp
- video: mp4, quicktime, webm, avi
- audio: mpeg, wav, ogg, webm, mp4
- file: pdf, doc, docx, xls, xlsx, zip, txt

Max file size: 50MB

Returns metadata to use when sending the message.

Upload a voice note/voice message.

Supported formats: wav, mp3, m4a, ogg, webm
Max file size: 10MB

Returns metadata to use when sending the audio message.

item.description: Endpoints for uploading media files for chat messages

request.description:
Authenticate a Pusher private or presence channel.

Channel types:
- private-conversation.{id} - For conversation messages
- private-user.{id}.conversations - For user's conversation updates
- presence-online - For online status
